products.title: Cartoon Stainless Steel Baby Bowl Set - BPA Free 300ml with Spoon
products.body_html:
Cartoon Printed Stainless Steel Baby Feeding Bowl Set

This delightful feeding bowl set is designed specifically for your little ones, combining fun and functionality in one adorable package. Made from food-grade PP material and featuring a durable stainless steel liner, this bowl is not only safe for your child but also built to last through all their mealtime adventures.

Product Features:

Material: food grade PP material, stainless steel liner
Product Size: 11.5 * 5.5CM
Product Capacity: 300ML
One Set Includes: bowl + lid + spoon

This bowl features a double-layer design, with a stainless steel inner lining that keeps meals warm and a PP outer layer that is both lightweight and easy to grip. The charming cartoon prints will make mealtime fun and exciting for your little one, encouraging them to eat independently while enjoying their favorite characters.

Please note that it is normal for water to enter the middle layer of the bowl due to the manufacturing process, but rest assured this will not affect the bowl's functionality. For optimal care, avoid placing it in the microwave or disinfection cabinet.

Why Choose Our Baby Bowl Set?

  • BPA Free: Safety is our priority, and this bowl set is free from harmful chemicals.
  • Insulated Design: Keeps food warm for longer, perfect for those slower eaters.
  • Easy to Clean: The stainless steel liner is easy to wipe down, making cleanup a breeze.
  • Perfect Size: Ideal for toddlers aged 1-2 years, with a 300ml capacity that's just right for small portions.
  • Fun and Engaging: The bright, cartoon designs are sure to capture your child's attention and make mealtime enjoyable.

products.body_html:
Introducing our delightful 3Pcs/Set Baby Bowl, Spoon, and Fork Feeding Food Tableware featuring an adorable Cartoon Bear design! This charming dinnerware set is perfect for your little ones, making mealtime fun and enjoyable while ensuring safety and practicality.


 

High-Quality Materials:
Crafted from a combination of Wheat Straw and PP, this dinnerware set is both eco-friendly and durable. Unlike silicone, our materials are safe for your child and free from harmful chemicals, ensuring a worry-free dining experience.

Perfectly Sized for Little Hands:
The bowl measures 20cm x 20cm, providing ample space for your child's favorite meals. The spoon and fork are designed for easy handling, each measuring 15.5cm x 3.3cm, making them ideal for little hands learning to eat independently.

Anti-Hot Training Plate:
The bowl's unique design helps prevent overheating, making it suitable for serving warm meals without the risk of burns. This feature is essential for parents who want to encourage their kids to explore new foods safely.

Fun and Engaging Design:
The Cartoon Bear theme adds a playful touch to your child's dining experience, encouraging them to enjoy their meals and develop healthy eating habits. The vibrant colors and cute design will surely capture your child's attention.

Lightweight and Convenient:
Weighing in at approximately 125g, this dinnerware set is lightweight and easy to handle, making it perfect for home use or on-the-go dining. Whether at a picnic, playdate, or traveling, this set is a fantastic companion.

Note:

1. Due to different monitors and light effects, the actual color of the item may vary slightly from the pictures. 
2. Due to manual measurement, please allow a 1-3cm measuring deviation.
3. Each bowl may have small mold interface dots at the bottom, which do not affect its use. If this is a concern, please consider this before ordering.

Make mealtime a delightful experience for your little one with our 3Pcs/Set Baby Bowl, Spoon, and Fork Feeding Food Tableware! Order now and watch your child enjoy their meals with joy and excitement!

products.title: Delightful 3-Piece Baby Feeding Set - Adorable Cartoon Bear Bowl, Spoon & Fork for Joyful Mealtimes!
products.body_html:
Introducing the adorable 3-Piece Baby Feeding Set, featuring a delightful Cartoon Bear design that will make mealtime fun for your little ones! This charming set is perfect for toddlers aged 1-2 years, making it an essential addition to your child's dining experience. Crafted from eco-friendly wheat straw and high-quality PP material, this set ensures safety and durability for everyday use. With three delightful colors to choose from—pink, blue, and beige—you can easily find the perfect shade to match your child's personality and nursery decor.


The set includes a generously sized bowl, spoon, and fork, providing everything your child needs for a complete dining experience. The bowl, with a diameter of 20cm (7.87in), is perfect for serving a variety of meals, from cereals to pasta and more! The spoon, measuring 15.5cm x 3.3cm (6.1in x 1.3in), is designed for little hands, encouraging self-feeding and independence. Meanwhile, the fork, at 15.5cm x 2.5cm (6.1in x 0.98in), makes it easy for your toddler to pick up food and develop their fine motor skills. Make mealtime enjoyable and stress-free with this delightful feeding set, designed with both functionality and fun in mind!


This adorable feeding set is perfect for various use cases that will enhance your child's dining experience. Firstly, it can be used for everyday meals, making breakfast, lunch, and dinner a delightful adventure for your little one. Secondly, it's great for introducing new foods, as the fun design encourages toddlers to try different dishes without any fuss.

Thirdly, the set is ideal for playdates or family gatherings, where your child can enjoy meals alongside friends and family in a cheerful atmosphere. Fourthly, it serves as a wonderful gift for baby showers or first birthdays, bringing joy and practicality to new parents. Lastly, the set can also be used for snack time, making it easier for toddlers to enjoy fruits, yogurt, or other small bites in a fun and interactive way.

 

Upgrade your child's dining experience with the 3-Piece Baby Feeding Set today and watch them enjoy their meals like never before! The Cartoon Bear design will capture your child's imagination and make them excited for every meal, ensuring that mealtime is not just a routine but a delightful experience.

products.title: Leakproof Silicone Baby Drink Cup - Perfect for Toddlers & Kids, 220ML Water Bottle
products.body_html:
Introducing the Baby Learn to Drink Cup, the perfect drinkware solution for toddlers and kids! Designed with young learners in mind, this silicone cup is not only adorable but also practical, ensuring a smooth transition from bottle to cup. With a generous capacity of 220ML, it is ideal for quenching your little one's thirst throughout the day.

Crafted from high-quality silicone, this cup is soft to the touch yet durable enough to withstand the rigors of daily use. The leakproof design means you can say goodbye to messy spills, allowing your child to explore their independence without the worry of accidents. Whether at home, in the park, or on the go, this cup is a reliable companion for your child’s hydration needs.

The Baby Learn to Drink Cup is thoughtfully designed without handles, making it easy for tiny hands to grip and sip comfortably. Its solid pattern adds a modern touch, while the vibrant colors are sure to delight your little one. Suitable for children aged 4 to 6 years, this cup is perfect for fostering self-sufficiency in drinking.

With CE/EU certification, you can trust that this product meets safety standards, giving you peace of mind as your child learns to drink independently. The silicone material is not only safe but also easy to clean, making it a hassle-free addition to your child’s mealtime routine.

Choose the Baby Learn to Drink Cup for a practical, stylish, and safe drinking solution for your toddler. Watch them grow and learn with every sip!

products.title: Live Mics - Fun Bluetooth Microphone for Kids
products.body_html:
"Playtime is transformed into a stage performance, and a quiet voice is no longer a limitation with the Live Mics Bluetooth Microphone for Kids. Shyness, boredom, and flimsy toy microphones are minimized, allowing for a confident, creative voice and lasting entertainment. Its wireless connectivity and integrated speaker exceeded expectations, ensuring reliable performance and a vital addition to any child's toy collection."

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ - Lynn Tomlinson
✅ Verified Buyer

A child's desire to sing and perform is often hindered by traditional toy microphones that lack functionality, break easily, or are simply not engaging. Without a tool that truly amplifies a child's voice and connects to their favorite music, creative play can feel restricted. The constant struggle with these issues can result in a child's frustration, a diminished sense of imagination, and a general feeling of being limited, highlighting the critical need for an effective and exciting solution like a dedicated Bluetooth Microphone for Kids.

Live Mics' High-Performance Bluetooth Microphone for Kids features a wireless speaker and microphone combination, simple controls, and a durable, child-safe design for optimal play. Its clear sound quality and easy-to-use functions reduce frustration while boosting confidence and ensuring a fun, interactive experience. Confident self-expression and reduced reliance on basic toys bring a smoother, more enjoyable creative journey.

REASONS WHY LIVE MICS BLUETOOTH MICROPHONE FOR KIDS WILL CHANGE PLAYTIME EXPERIENCES

✅ ALL-IN-ONE ENTERTAINMENT: Live Mics combines a microphone and a powerful speaker in one compact device. This integrated design allows a child to sing along to music from any Bluetooth-enabled device, making it an indispensable Bluetooth Microphone for Kids for impromptu karaoke sessions.

✅ HASSLE-FREE WIRELESS CONNECTIVITY: The seamless Bluetooth pairing of Live Mics makes it easy for a child to connect to smartphones, tablets, and other devices. This wireless freedom means no tangled cords and an effortless setup for a stress-free experience.

✅ DURABLE & CHILD-SAFE DESIGN: Crafted from tough, non-toxic materials, Live Mics is built to withstand the bumps and drops of active play. The rounded edges and easy-to-grip handle ensure it is safe and comfortable for small hands.

✅ EASY-TO-USE CONTROLS: With intuitive buttons for volume, echo effects, and track control, Live Mics is simple for a child to operate independently. This allows for more immersive play without needing constant parental assistance.

✅ PROMOTES CREATIVITY & CONFIDENCE: By providing a platform for a child to express themselves through music and speech, Live Mics helps to build confidence, improve communication skills, and spark imaginative play.

HOW TO USE LIVE MICS BLUETOOTH MICROPHONE FOR KIDS

1.      Charge the Device: Use the provided USB cable to charge the Live Mics Bluetooth Microphone for Kids until the indicator light shows a full charge.

2.      Power On & Pair: Press and hold the power button to turn on the microphone. Turn on Bluetooth on a preferred device (e.g., smartphone, tablet) and select "Live Mics" from the list of available devices to pair.

3.      Play Music & Sing: Play music from the connected device. The sound will come through the microphone's speaker, allowing a child to sing along.

4.      Adjust the Sound: Use the buttons on the microphone to control volume, skip songs, or add fun echo effects to the voice.

The persistent problem of flimsy toy microphones, the frustration of tangled wires, and the lack of interactive features often trigger a sense of boredom, limited creative expression, and a feeling that a child's voice is not heard. Relying on basic toys can increase a child's frustration and reduce the joy of imaginative play.

products.title: Silicone Baby Fruit and Vegetable Teether - Safe Feeding Tableware for Infants
products.body_html:
Introducing the Baby Fruit and Vegetable Teether Food Supplement Bite Le Silicone Baby Feeding Tableware – the perfect solution for introducing your little one to the joys of solid food! Designed with care and attention to detail, this innovative silicone feeder is ideal for infants and toddlers aged 0-36 months, making mealtime a delightful experience for both you and your baby.

Crafted from food-grade PP and silicone, our feeder ensures that every bite is safe and hygienic. With dimensions of 11 cm x 5 cm and a lightweight design of just 0.036 kg, it’s easy for little hands to hold. Available in vibrant colors like Yellow, Blue, Pink, and Green, it’s not just functional but also visually appealing!

Using the feeder is simple: wash it thoroughly, cut fruits and vegetables into small pieces or grind them into a puree, and place them inside the feeder. Secure the lid to prevent any leaks, and let your baby explore new flavors! Babies over 3 months can enjoy rice cereal and fruit purees, while those over 6 months can munch on small pieces of fruits and vegetables. Once they reach 12 months, you can introduce protein-rich foods like fish fillets and ground meat. This feeder not only helps with the transition to solid foods but also promotes healthy chewing habits, keeping your baby’s gums and teeth in great condition.

Tips for use:

1. Our silicone mesh bag is made from high-quality, food-grade silicone rubber that is safe, non-toxic, and tasteless. It’s durable, easy to clean, and designed to withstand the rigors of mealtime. Please note that darker fruits and vegetables may stain the silicone mesh, which is normal and does not affect its functionality.

2. As each feeder is measured by hand, please allow for a slight error of 2-3 cm. Make sure you are comfortable with this before making your purchase.

3. Due to variations in display settings, the color of the actual product may differ slightly from the images. We appreciate your understanding!

products.title: Ultimate Spill-Proof Silicone Baby Feeding Bowl and Spoon Set - Safe & Durable Tableware for Happy Mealtimes!
products.body_html:
• Premium Quality Silicone Material: Our Premium Spill-Proof Silicone Baby Feeding Bowl and Spoon Set is crafted from 100% food-grade silicone, ensuring that your little one's meals are both safe and durable. This high-quality material is designed to withstand the rigors of daily feeding, providing peace of mind for parents.


 

• Innovative Spill-Proof Design: Say goodbye to messy mealtimes! The unique spill-proof design of this feeding bowl minimizes spills and messes, allowing your baby to explore their food without the worry of creating chaos. Cleanup is a breeze, making mealtime enjoyable for both you and your child.

 

• Versatile and Functional: This silicone baby feeding bowl is perfect for a variety of baby foods, from purees to solid bites. Its versatility enhances your child's feeding journey, accommodating their growing appetite and evolving tastes.

 

• Baby-Friendly Design: Specifically designed for infants, this silicone feeding bowl features a gentle curvature that makes it easy for tiny hands to grasp. The set is ideal for baby-led weaning, promoting independence during mealtimes while ensuring a safe feeding experience.

 

• Effortless Cleaning: Cleaning up after meals has never been easier! The silicone material allows for quick and easy cleaning, whether you choose to hand wash or toss it in the dishwasher. Spend less time scrubbing and more time enjoying precious moments with your little one.

 

• Secure Suction Cup Base: The upgraded large suction cups provide maximum stability, preventing your child from throwing their bowl during mealtime. Simply place it on any flat surface, and enjoy worry-free feeding sessions without the mess.

 

• Safe and Non-Toxic: Made from non-toxic, BPA-free, PVC-free, lead-free, and phthalate-free materials, this baby feeding bowl is designed with your child's health in mind. It won't leach harmful chemicals into your baby's food, ensuring a safe and healthy dining experience.

 

• Temperature Resistant: This durable silicone bowl can withstand temperatures ranging from -104°F to 392°F, making it safe for use in the microwave, dishwasher, oven, and freezer. Whether you're reheating meals or storing leftovers, this bowl has you covered.

 

• Stylish and Practical: With its sleek design and vibrant colors, this baby feeding bowl and spoon set is not only functional but also stylish. It's the perfect addition to your baby's mealtime essentials, making every meal a delightful experience.

 

• Origin: Mainland China

 

About this item:

*Prevent spills and messes with our innovative suction cup bowl! The BRVTOT baby bowl features upgraded large suction cups for maximum stability, ensuring worry-free mealtimes. It fits most flat surfaces, making it a must-have for any feeding setup.

*For optimal suction, apply a little water to the suction base before pressing it against a high chair or table. This silicone bowl is perfect for baby-led weaning and solid feeding, providing a safe and healthy option for your little one.

*Durable & Easy to Clean: Our thickened silicone bowl is designed to withstand the vigorous pulling of babies, ensuring long-lasting use. It resists corrosion and cleaning agent residue, making it easy to maintain. Hand washing takes less than a minute, or you can use baby wipes for quick cleanups!

products.body_html:
Introducing the Suction Cup Baby Bowl Set - the ultimate training dishes designed to make mealtime enjoyable and stress-free for both parents and little ones! This innovative dinnerware set includes a sturdy bowl, a spoon, and a fork, all crafted with your child's needs in mind.

Size Chart:
Inner wall diameter: 12.2cm/4.8" | Deep Bowl: 5cm/1.97" | Sucker diameter: 8.8cm/3.46" | Total width of the bowl: 16.2cm/3.38" | Total height of the bowl: 6cm/2.36"

Material: PP (Polypropylene)
Function: Dinnerware Set
Certification: CE / EU
Pattern Type: Solid
Material Feature: BPA Free, Latex Free
Classification: Dinnerware Set

Features:

Constructed from high-quality PP material, this bowl set is tasteless, non-toxic, and highly durable, ensuring it withstands the rigors of everyday use.
The super strong suction base keeps the bowl securely in place, preventing spills and messes during feeding time, making it an ideal training bowl for your little one.
Bright and vibrant colors add a fun element to mealtime, making it an exciting experience for your child while encouraging them to eat independently.
Available in three delightful colors, this bowl set is designed to be loved by children, making it a perfect addition to their dining essentials.
Say goodbye to worries about broken dishes, as this set is designed to be both safe and resilient, giving you peace of mind during feeding time.

1 x Baby Sucker Bowl + Spoon + Fork

products.title: Ultimate Suction Cup Baby Bowl Set with Spoon - Ideal Training Tableware for Little Ones!
products.body_html:
Introducing our Suction Cup Baby Bowl Set with Spoon - the ultimate training tableware designed specifically for your little ones! This innovative set is perfect for encouraging your child to eat independently while minimizing mess at mealtime.

Features:

  • Secure Suction Cup Base: The bowl is equipped with a TPE material suction cup at the bottom, providing high elasticity and anti-aging properties. This clever design ensures the bowl stays firmly in place, preventing spills and making mealtime a breeze.
  • Lightweight & Easy to Clean: Made from durable PP material, the bowl is lightweight and easy to handle. It's also high temperature resistant, making it suitable for all types of food. Cleanup is a snap - simply wash with water or place it in the dishwasher!
  • Temperature-Sensitive Spoon: Our set includes a specially designed spoon that changes color when the food temperature exceeds 40 degrees Celsius, allowing you to ensure your child's food is safe to eat.
  • Insulated Lid: The ingeniously designed suction cup comes with a lid for added insulation, keeping food warm longer and making it perfect for on-the-go meals.
  • Pre-Use Preparation: For best results, wash the bowl with water and place it in boiling water for 2-3 minutes before use to ensure optimal suction.

Specifications:

  • Material: PP + TPE
  • Color: As shown in images
  • Bowl Size: 16*6cm
  • Spoon Size: 13*2.5cm

Package Includes:

  • Set 1: 1 bowl + 1 cover + 1 spoon
  • Set 2: 1 bowl + 1 fork + 1 spoon

Rest assured, this product is 100% brand new and of high quality, certified safe for your little ones. Ideal for babies aged 7-12 years, this bowl set is free from harmful chemicals and PVC, making it a safe choice for your child's dining experience.

Don't miss out on this essential mealtime companion! Add our store to your Favorite Stores to stay updated on new arrivals and exclusive discounts!

products.title: Vibrant Silicone Baby Feeding Bowl Set with Spoon - Waterproof and Easy Mealtime Solution!
products.body_html:
Product Description
Product Name: Vibrant Food Grade Silicone Baby Feeding Bowl Set with Spoon
Material: Food Grade Silicone
Size: As shown in the pictures
Color: As shown in the pictures

 


Introducing our Vibrant Food Grade Silicone Baby Feeding Bowl Set with Spoon - the perfect mealtime solution for your little ones! Crafted from safe, food-grade silicone, this bowl set is designed for babies to use with complete confidence.

  1. **Exceptional Features of Our Silicone Products:**
    - **High Temperature Resistance:** Safe for temperatures from -40 to 230 degrees Celsius, our silicone bowls will not harden in the cold or melt in the heat, ensuring no toxic substances are released. They are microwave and oven safe!
    - **Easy to Clean:** Simply rinse with clean water after use or toss them in the dishwasher for effortless cleaning.
    - **Durability:** Our silicone material boasts stable chemical properties, giving our products a longer lifespan compared to traditional materials.

 

2. **Soft and Comfortable:** The gentle touch of silicone provides a comfortable feeding experience for babies, while remaining flexible and resistant to deformation.
3. **Strong Suction Base:** The oversized bottom of the bowl features a powerful suction force, making it nearly impossible for little hands to overturn during mealtime.
4. **Integrated Design:** The seamless molding of the bowl makes cleaning a breeze, significantly reducing the workload for busy parents.
5. **Vibrant Color Options:** Available in a variety of eye-catching colors, there’s sure to be a favorite for every child!






ABOUT FEEDBACK
❖ Your satisfaction is our priority. We appreciate your feedback!
